ygData.subject: RE: Missed Notes
ygData.msgSnippet: Could the missed notes only happens on certain server(s)?  I am a lv 44 bard on Cazic-Thule server, and I haven t notice any extra missed notes since this
ygData.messageBody:
Could the missed notes only happens on certain server(s)? I am a lv 44 bard
on Cazic-Thule server, and I haven't notice any extra missed notes since
this thing started. Not enough to notice it anyway. Or maybe it only
affects wood elf or human bard? I am a half elf. Or maybe it is level
related? Seems like a lot of the people who have the missed notes are in
their high 20s to high 30s.

>
>Let's consider the possibility that it (the missed note bug) may not happen
>_for_everyone_ - _all_of_the_time_.
>
>It's very possible that there is a bug but it does not affect everyone the
>same way.
>
